citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on
5/23/23.
The inspector arrived at 10:00 AM on 5/23/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to contact the Licensee by
phone (no answer) and then rang the doorbell at the front door. The person who was on the premises told the inspector
that the Licensee was at a distant off-site location and would not be available for several hours. An AWA compliance
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany
the inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on 
5/23/23. 
 
The inspector arrived at 10:00 AM on 5/23/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector tried to contact the Licensee by 
phone (no answer) and then rang the doorbell at the front door. The person who was on the premises told the inspector 
that the Licensee was at a distant off-site location and would not be available for several hours. An AWA compliance 
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany 
the inspector.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
